00043     void PowerExtractor::process(WaveFile* wav, const TransformOptions& options)
00044     {
00045         wavFilename = wav->getFilename();
00046 
00047         unsigned int framesCount = wav->getFramesCount();
00048         featureArray.resize(framesCount);
00049 
00050         if (m_indicator)
00051             m_indicator->start(0, framesCount-1);
00052 
00053         Transform transform(options);
00054         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < framesCount; ++i)
00055         {
00056             std::vector<double> params;
00057             params.push_back(transform.framePower(wav->frames[i]));
00058             featureArray[i] = params;
00059 
00060             if (m_indicator)
00061                 m_indicator->progress(i);
00062         }
00063 
00064         if (m_indicator)
00065             m_indicator->stop();
00066     }
